website_summaries.verdict: Adidas nailed it in terms of fit and performance with its Adizero Ubersonic offering, a first in the Three Stripes’ new generation of lightweight shoes that bid a swift response on any court surface. The combination of a breathable mesh upper, supportive chassis, and grippy outsole that make up this shoe are reasons why it has become the choice of speedy and dynamic players. It may not be loaded with tons of cushioning, but it’s secure and quick.
pros: Many buyers attest that the Adidas Adizero Ubersonic is exceptionally lightweight despite having loads of supportive features
Quite a lot of court players who love sliding across the court appreciate the shoe’s stability
Numerous instant supporters of the Adizero Ubersonic like the composition of the midfoot chassis as it prevents pronation issues
Emerging from the breathable Adidas tennis footwear range, this shoe is loved by oodles of users for its well-ventilated, summer-ready upper
A sizable number of reviewers affirm that the Adizero Ubersonic offers excellent traction
Several athletes vouch getting good ground sensitivity as this shoe feels low enough
cons: Some users would have adored the Adizero Ubersonic more if the tongue had extra padding
Its thin lacing system is a demerit to a couple of wearers as it digs into their insteps

customer_reviews.title: Great quality good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Great fit and great price. I really like them. They are secure and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: AB77

customer_reviews.title: Great Tennis shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very confi shoes! As they have to be! Also great on clay!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Guedes

customer_reviews.title: Shoes didnt last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved how these shoes looked and felt, but the bottoms wore out in under 2 months (playing 2-3x per week). very disappointed. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jrepasky

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Transaction
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Product arrived on time. It arrived in perfect condition, brand new. The price was amazing. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted a stylish shoe that was durable and this was the one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cavenaugh

customer_reviews.title: Very light with good ankle support!
customer_reviews.text: Very light, with good ankle support. Makes your tennis rallies so agile and comfortable! Well built shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Tanglao

customer_reviews.title: Look great. Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Look great. Fit great. But the least durable shoes I've ever experienced. Literally wore through to the toe in less than 10 matches.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Worst tennis shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE - they will give you huge blisters at the back of your ankles on both of your feet after a few uses. What they don't show you is the seriously tough plastic piece that wraps around the shoe just under your achilles tendon, where your heel will rub into even when you are walking normally. Worst tennis shoes I've ever had, will be going back to Adidas Barricades which I have worn my whole life.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: it fits great. Love the retro-futuristic look of it with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Snug at first, but once it's broken in with casual walking or a game of tennis, it fits great. Love the retro-futuristic look of it with the blue/red stripes, and the exterior padding makes it look like it was designed by NASA. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleQ

customer_reviews.title: Very  fashion but WONT LAST!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish shoes! Looks great. Fit great. But won't last 2 months NOT a durable shoes sole, I wore it only for very few and special important matches but but but I can't wear them anymore or so. If U decide 2 buy it be aware that WONT last 2+ months!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus V.

product_meta.title: adidas mens BB6892 Adizero Ubersonic 50yrs Ltd
product_meta.description: These men's tennis shoes provide the advantage of speed with an improved lightweight fit and better responsiveness. An adidas prime knit upper provides a natural fit, while sprint frame construction and midfoot webbing offer lightweight stability.
